fields.Title: TRIBUNAL / JOYCE WOULDN'T LIKE THIS!
fields.Description: "Your Wild Pines boss would never approve of this!"

fields.Title: START
input
You: ""Wild Pines is not going to forgive..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wild Pines is not going to forgive you massacring a bunch on innocent people."

fields.Title: You: ""Okay. Let me just say one thing......"
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay. Let me just say one thing..." (Change the topic.)

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Stay cool," Titus shouts to his me..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Stay cool," Titus shouts to his men in the background. "How is she?"

fields.Title: Shanky: ""Guys, I, uh..." The little guy bre..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Guys, I, uh..." The little guy breaks formation. "I'd just get in the way. I don't even have a gun."

fields.Title: Kortenaer: ""She'll be gone soon too. Company b..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "She'll be gone soon too. Company bitch is gone, Lely's gone. Fuck are we still doing in this shithole?" He looks around, tired suddenly -- sad even.
fields.Alternate1: "She'll be gone soon too. Company bitch is gone. Lely's cunt is gone. Lely's gone. Fuck are we still doing in this shithole?" He looks around, tired suddenly -- sad even.

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "They're huddled close, in a formati..."
fields.Dialogue Text: They're huddled close, in a formation. Steel. The rest will stay. Even if it means dying here -- with him.

fields.Title: JOYCEHUBMERC
Jump to: [tribunalHUB]
Kortenaer: ""She's fucking GONE!" The shout ech..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "She's fucking GONE!" The shout echoes back from the Whirling windows. "She fucking sailed off! You're *alone*."

fields.Title: Kortenaer: ""She's gone, you stupid fuck." He p..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "She's gone, you stupid fuck." He points to the sea. "Sailed off five minutes ago. She doesn't give a shit about you silos. You're *alone*."

fields.Title: Empathy: "He isn't just boasting. He really d..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He isn't just boasting. He really doesn't care. Back out of this *now* or it'll get bad.

fields.Title: Jump to: [tribunalHUB]
Kortenaer: ""The company bitch is gone. Lely's..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The company bitch is gone. Lely's gone. Fuck are we still doing in this shithole?" He looks around, tired suddenly -- sad even.
fields.Alternate1: "The company bitch is gone. Lely's cunt is gone. Lely's gone. Fuck are we still doing in this shithole?" He looks around, tired suddenly -- sad even.

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "Now is NOT a good time to strike. H..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Now is NOT a good time to strike. He's looking right at your hands. Do something else, get him distracted...

fields.Title: You: ""She is going to be mad when she he..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "She is going to be mad when she hears about this."

fields.Title: You: ""What if I just call her now, huh?"..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What if I just call her now, huh?" (Raise your voice).

fields.Title: Variable["plaza.tribunal_gardener_shot"]
Variable["plaza.tribunal_gardener_shot"]
!(Variable["plaza.tribunal_gardener_shot"])
Half Light: "They're *afraid*. All of them. Trem..."
fields.Dialogue Text: They're *afraid*. All of them. Trembling reeds in the wind. They'll run, scatter, soon. One by one.

fields.Title: Kortenaer: ""She's gone, you stupid fuck." He p..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "She's gone, you stupid fuck." He points to the sea. "Sailed off -- five minutes ago. She doesn't give a shit about you silos..."

fields.Title: Kortenaer: "The man stares at you with bloodsho..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The man stares at you with bloodshot eyes, a bull ready to charge -- he's not listening, but looking for an opening...

fields.Title: De Paule: ""Fucking waste this fuck!" The woma..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fucking waste this fuck!" The woman squawks.

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Stay cool, don't do anything stupi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Stay cool, don't do anything stupid," Titus shouts to his men in the background.

fields.Title: The Gardener: ""I'll be okay... I'll be..." She pu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'll be okay... I'll be..." She puts her bloody hand on her heart and starts shaking.

fields.Title: You: ""We're working together. She knew y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We're working together. She knew you're out of control. She told me."

fields.Title: Volition: "Ignore her. She's not the main thre..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Ignore her. She's not the main threat yet.

fields.Title: Kortenaer: ""You think I care what that company..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You think I care what that company cunt thinks?" He laughs. It's a hollow laughter.

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Hold your ground.“ Titus turns to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hold your ground.“ Titus turns to his men as the other one runs to the yard. "Any more of you run I'll shoot you myself. We're *doing* this -- together."

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "No. The rest will stay. They will h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No. The rest will stay. They will hold their ground. Even if it means dying here -- with you.

fields.Title: Perception (Sight): "As you look to the bay you see a sm..."
fields.Dialogue Text: As you look to the bay you see a small green sail on the horizon -- by the crumbling seafort -- growing smaller...

fields.Title: Variable["plaza.tribunal_half_light_they_are_all_afraid"]
